author: daniel.friedman
title: GameFi/Metaverse Developer Treasury
description: 我们如何为希望建立在Cardano上并使用CNFTs的GameFi和metaverse项目提供一个专门的去中心化的融资途径？

f6_assessments.q0:
Disclaimer: my view points are shaped by my multi-year experience in product management and software development.

Attracting new contributors interested in Games and NFT sectors to the Cardano ecosystem supports Fund 8 strategic goals: grow contributors and grow app and dev ecosystem.

At the same time, the proposal does not provide an elabolrate analysis and specific examples why a focus on NFT and Gaming use cases can bring a higher ROI to the commity in comparison to approaching those through broader challenges, such as DApps and Integrations or  Developer Ecosystem. 

In addition, the proposal would be stronger if it discussed the expected impact from the funds requested based on the historical success cases.

I have made the following deductions:
- 1 point for the lack of a clear analysis of alternative approaches to prove that focus on this user segment can bring high ROI to the community.
- 1 point for the lack of a discusion about the ability to achieve a noticeable impact.
My rating is 3
f6_assessments.q1:
Given that the objective is to distribute funds to new projects, and that the proposing team is already experienced with this type of projects, gives confidence that the proposal is feasible.

At the same time, the proposal aims to make Cardano a preferred destination but does not provide a details of the needs and use cases of Gaming and NFT developers and what specifically needs to be done to make Cardano a go to blockchain for each of those use cases and if the requested funds and community skills are sufficient.

I have made the following deductions:
- 1 point for the lack of analysis of specific use cases.
- 1 point for the lack of a discussion about the sufficiency of the requested funds to achieve a noticeable impact.
My rating is 3.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposal present's some metrics that can help track its progress (the number of new users, the number of projects, the number of content creators).

However, the above metrics are not sufficient to evaluate to relative impact on the cardano ecosystem. The proposal would be stronger if it considered the following metrics for inclusion:
1) The % of Cardano users onboarded though projects within this initiative.
2) The share of transaciton volume created through projects within this initiaitve.
3) The developer/content creator satisfaction with Cardano ecosystem vs competitors.

I have made the following deductions:
- 1 point for the lack of metrics evaluating the relative impact on the Cardano ecosystem.
- 1 point for the lack of metrics evaluating user satisfaction and the competitiveness of the solutions.
My rating is 3.

The video game industry revenue is forecast to reach $180.1 billion in 2021. It marked a 10.7% growth between 2016 and 2017 and then 10.9% between 2017 and 2018. Casual and hyper-casual games rule the mobile gaming world. As of October 2021, the total market capitalization of Web 2.0 metaverse companies was 14.8 trillion U.S. dollars.
Gamification will be the key to added utilization within the crypto-industry, and the network that will deliver the fastest, cheapest and most decentralized service will be the winning. 

GameFi/Metaverse Developer project can be critical to Cardano's mission of financial assess to many.
f6_assessments.q1: Very Feasible.  This project brings a new focus to the community; building a community within the community, who's members are passionate about both gaming and Cardano.
f6_assessments.q2:
The KPI's are very measurable and appropriate.  A very active community will be able audit and hold the project accountable. 
Key Metrics to measure
Amount of new users attracted to the Cardano metaverse from outside ecosystems
Amount of new GameFi projects launched on Cardano via the Lovelace portal
Variety of projects attracted by the incentive
Amount of new content creators attracted to the CNFT ecosystem via fund
Total net income of metaverse & GameFi projects launched on Cardano with the help of the Lovelace GameFi treasury

f6_assessments.q0: A case can be made that this proposal prepares a group of people to make contributions to the Cardano ecosystem however this is a proposal for a specific new treasury and funding process instead of a Challenge Setting. This proposal should have been placed under the Rapid Funding Mechanism challenge or the Miscellaneous challenge.
f6_assessments.q1: There is evidence that the Cardano community has the capacity and interest in GameFi and metaverse funding that can be seen in the Gamers Unchained challenge and PlayerMint for instance.  To improve challenge: better articulate the demonstrated demand for the proposed budget (most easily done based upon excess total proposal budgets in previous funding rounds).
f6_assessments.q2: The suggested metrics are good however the success criteria define a proposal solution of a "decentralized treasury" instead of challenge success criteria.
